name: Avery Chen
title: Senior Frontend Engineer
summary: Frontend engineer focused on shipping high-signal product experiences with resilient UI architecture.

highlights: Re-architected the customer analytics dashboard, reducing TTI by 38% and improving retention of key workflows.
Led the adoption of App Router patterns across multiple teams with shared component libraries.
Designed a rollout framework for complex UI migrations with zero downtime.
Delivered modular storefront components used by 20+ enterprise retailers.
Built experimentation tools for merchandising workflows that reduced launch time by 45%.
Implemented accessibility and regression testing standards for checkout flows.
